original_title: Stevie Ray Vaughan and Double Trouble Live at Montreux 1985
overview: Stevie Ray Vaughan and Double Trouble: Live at Montreux July 15, 1985.  Three years later, when Stevie was invited back to headline "Blues Night" at the festival, the crowd, now familiar with Stevie's songs and albums treated him like the conquering hero,And Stevie again played like his life depended on it because as we all came to recognize and respect that was the only way he knew how.
title: Stevie Ray Vaughan and Double Trouble Live at Montreux 1985
